    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      The static main method is the entry point to the program. It calls other methods to perform matrix generation, display, and file saving.
      Parameters:
      args - The command-line arguments passed to the program.

    • inputSize

      public static int inputSize()
      Reads and validates the size of the square matrix from the user. It handles input exceptions and keeps prompting until a valid size is provided.
      Returns:
      int size of matrix

    • inputFiller

      public static char inputFiller()
      Reads and validates the character to fill the matrix from the user. It handles input exceptions and keeps prompting until a valid character is provided.
      Returns:
      The character symbol provided by the user.

    • generateJaggedArr

      public static char[][] generateJaggedArr(int size, char filler)
      Generates a jagged square matrix of the specified size and fills it with the provided character.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the square matrix to be generated.
      filler - The character to fill the matrix with.
      Returns:
      The generated jagged square matrix as a 2D character array.

    • showJuggedArr

      public static void showJuggedArr(char[][] juggedArr)
      Displays the generated jagged square matrix in the console.
      Parameters:
      juggedArr - The jagged square matrix to be displayed.

    • saveJuggedArrToFile

      public static void saveJuggedArrToFile(char[][] juggedArr)
      Saves the generated jagged square matrix to a text file named "lab2/MyFile.txt".
      Parameters:
      juggedArr - The jagged square matrix to be saved to the txt file.
